moreBlocks.articles:
• Fair Debt Collection
    We are one of only a few firms that litigate this type of case in the state of West Virginia. We even teach other attorneys how to defend debtors who are unfairly subject to the collection of a debt or illegal debt collection practices.
  • Bankruptcy
    When filing for Chapter 7 or Chapter 13 bankruptcy is the right decision for you and your family, our bankruptcy attorneys are prepared to guide you through the process, helping you avoid pitfalls and rebuild your financial health.
  • Commercial Traffic Violations
    From our offices in Charleston and Parkersburg, we represent commercial drivers from West Virginia and surrounding states.
  • Personal Injury
    With more than 55 years of combined experience, the attorneys of Powell & Majestro P.L.L.C. are respected throughout West Virginia and nationwide for their effective, tenacious representation of injury victims.
  • Complex Litigation
    Powell & Majestro P.L.L.C. concentrates on finding cutting-edge legal theories on behalf of our clients in large complex litigations.

description:
Here at the law office of Powell & Majestro P.L.L.C. in Charleston, West Virginia, we provide quality, personalized counsel and support to a diverse range of clients dealing with serious legal challenges that affect their lives, their finances, their livelihoods and their future.

With an additional office in Parkersburg, we serve the rights and interests of clients throughout the state and across the country who have complex and pressing legal issues involving any of the following:

  • Creditor harassment and fair debt collection abuses
  • Bankruptcy
  • Personal injury
  • Lemon law
  • Litigation, appeals and class actions
  • Traffic ticket defense, particularly for commercial drivers
  • Oil and gas injuries

Our law firm's attorneys possess more than 55 years of combined legal experience, and we

have achieved notable success advocating on behalf of individuals, families and businesses during their most dire times of need. Although we are highly effective trial attorneys, we strive to help our clients resolve their conflicts and reach agreements without the need for stressful and time-consuming litigation; however, we will not hesitate to fight on your behalf in court when necessary to help you secure the justice you deserve.

Whether inside or outside the courtroom, you can trust that we will work hard to protect your rights, preserve your entitlements and help increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you seek. We employ a vast network of professional resources and utilize the latest in technology to help our clients resolve their matters as efficiently as possible.

To find out more about how Powell & Majestro P.L.L.C. can best serve your needs and help you secure a brighter future for yourself and your family, you can call our law office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation. We also work on a contingency basis for most matters, so you won't have to worry about the cost of retaining the effective representation you need and deserve.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
